uzbek_taomlari.title: Osh
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Sabzi, piyoz, yog', guruch, tuz murch
uzbek_taomlari.method: Birinchi bo'lib qozonga yog'ni quyamiz, so'ngra piyozni solamiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Manti
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Go'sht, un, piyoz, qatiq, tuz, qalampir
uzbek_taomlari.method: Go'shti, piyozni yiqaymiz va tozalaymiz, so'ngra yirik un bilan qalin qovoqni tayyorlaymiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Lagmon
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Go'sht, soch, un, piyoz, sabzi, tuz
uzbek_taomlari.method: Go'shti sochdan yong'oq xilma xil qirib, piyozni solaymiz, so'ngra qalin unli qovoqni tayyorlaymiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Mastava
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Go'sht, qovoq, guruch, piyoz, kartoshka, sabzi, tuz
uzbek_taomlari.method: Go'shtni qaynatab olamiz, so'ngra piyoz va kartoshkalarni solaymiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Shashlik
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Tovuq go'shti, qatiq, piyoz, qalampir, tuz, zira
uzbek_taomlari.method: Go'shtni qaynatab olamiz, so'ngra piyoz bilan birlashtiramiz va qatiqda terimiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Norin
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Go'sht, soch, piyoz, sabzi, zereshk, tuz
uzbek_taomlari.method: Go'shti sochdan yong'oq xilma xil qirib, piyozni solaymiz, so'ngra sabzi bilan birlashtiramiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Somsa
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Go'sht, un, piyoz, qalampir, tuz, zira
uzbek_taomlari.method: Go'shti yong'oq xilma xil qirib, piyozni solaymiz, so'ngra unli qovoqni tayyorlaymiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Shurva
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Go'sht, piyoz, kartoshka, sabzi, tuz, zira
uzbek_taomlari.method: Go'shtni qaynatab olamiz, so'ngra piyoz bilan birlashtiramiz va kartoshkalarni solaymiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Dimlama
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Go'sht, guruch, sabzi, g'uvurma, kartoshka, garam masala, zira, tuz
uzbek_taomlari.method: Go'shti qaynatab olamiz, so'ngra g'uvurmani solaymiz, sabzini qo'shamiz va garam masala bilan aromat beramiz...

uzbek_taomlari.title: Lepeshka
uzbek_taomlari.ingredients: Un, maya, yog', guruch, tuz, to'qay
uzbek_taomlari.method: Un va mayani suv bilan aralashtiramiz, so'ngra yog' va tuzni qo'shamiz va to'qay bilan yo'ramiz...

recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice
